QuestData.Title: Plunderbeard's Journal
QuestData.Description: Whatever was written on the remaining pages of Plunderbeard's journal must be recovered. Search the chambers located on the other side of this tunnel for Plunderbeard's assailants. They must be the ones who tore the journal apart!$B$BShould you recover the missing pages, return them to Ambo Cash at the entrance of the Wintergarde Mausoleum.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Page 4 of Plunderbeard's Journal, Page 5 of Plunderbeard's Journal, Page 6 of Plunderbeard's Journal, and Page 7 of Plunderbeard's Journal and return them to Ambo Cash at the Wintergarde Mausoleum in Dragonblight.
QuestData.CompletionText: I certainly don't feel like a winner...
QuestData.RewardText: <Ambo reads through the recovered journal pages.>$B$BThere's some good news and there's some bad news. Which do you want first?$B$BAh hell, why give you a choice? The good news is that if we can get Thel'zan's phylactery, we can destroy him. The bad news is that the phylactery is on a rather large frostwyrm.
